title: Subnets and IPs docs
introduction: IBM has three types of subnets (Primary, Secondary, and Global IP), with each subnet providing IP addresses to resources in different ways.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with subnets and IPs
section_recommended.description: Get started setting up subnets and IPs.

section_recommended.title: About subnets and IPs
section_recommended.description: Learn specific terminology for the types, and uses, of subnets. Knowing their intended use helps you understand how best to use them in your cloud infrastructure.

section_recommended.title: Ordering secondary subnets and global IP addresses
section_recommended.description: Secondary subnets provide additional, independent IP addresses for your compute resources and are available until canceled.

tiles.title: Remove obsolete links
tiles.description: Removed obsolete links from the getting started and ordering topics.
